node.statement: Construct the O-slice filtration on Sp^G. Define tau_O^{>=n} = {X in Sp^G : [Sigma, X]^G = 0 for every O-slice cell Sigma of dimension < n}. Prove: (a) tau_O^{>=n} is a localizing subcategory, (b) the inclusion admits a right adjoint P_O^n (O-slice n-connective cover) by Bousfield localization, (c) the resulting tower is exhaustive and Hausdorff.
